name: Flap VR Prototype
description:
Built in Unity. Built using Windows Mixed Reality Headset.

Only supports Windows 10. Only tested using Windows Mixed Reality Headset.

Published here 11/4/2018

REQUIRES WINDOWS 10, MIXED REALITY VR HEADSET, 64 BIT SYSTEMS.

Controls:

- Flying up. Flap both handheld controllers up and down in sync in front of you  to gain lift.

- Flying forward. Press the triggers of both controllers to gain forward movement

- Turning. Your triggers apply flight in the direction you look with your head.

WARNING: ONLY SUPPORTS WINDOWS 10 CURRENTLY
